name: Cottage
description: {FEED}3{VP} if this {BLUE} is fed.

name: Farm
description: Feeds 4 {FEED} buildings anywhere in your town.

name: Granary
description: Feeds all {FEED} buildings in the 8 squares surrounding this {RED}.

name: Greenhouse
description: Feeds 1 contiguous group of {FEED} buildings anywhere in your town.

name: Orchard
description: Feeds all {FEED} buildings in the same row and column as this {RED}.

name: Fountain
description: 2{VP} if adjacent to another {GRAY}.

name: Millstone
description: 2{VP} if adjacent to {AAN} {RED} or {AAN} {YELLOW}.

name: Shed
description: 1{VP}. May be constructed on any empty square in your town.

name: Well
description: 1{VP} for each adjacent {BLUE}.

name: Abbey
description: 3{VP} if not adjacent to any {PURPLE}{PLURAL}, {GREEN}{PLURAL}, or {YELLOW}{PLURAL}.

name: Chapel
description: 1{VP} for each fed {BLUE}.

name: Cloister
description: 1{VP} for each {ORANGE} in a corner of your town.

name: Temple
description: 4{VP} if adjacent to 2 or more fed {BLUE}{PLURAL}.

name: Almshouse
description:
{VP} based on your constructed {GREEN}{PLURAL}.
{TABLE}{7}#\1\2\3\4\5\6+\{VP}\-1\5\-3\15\-5\26

name: Feast Hall
description: 2{VP}. +1{VP} if you have more {GREEN}{PLURAL} than the player on your right.

name: Inn
description: 3{VP} there are no other {GREEN}{PLURAL} in the same row or column as this {GREEN}.

name: Tavern
description:
{VP} based on your constructed {GREEN}{PLURAL}.
{TABLE}{6}#\1\2\3\4\5+\{VP}\2\5\9\14\20

name: Bakery
description: 3{VP} if adjacent to {AAN} {RED} or {AAN} {PURPLE}.

name: Market
description: 1{VP} for each {YELLOW} in the same row or column, but not both, as this {YELLOW}. (This includes itself.)

name: Tailor
description: 1{VP}. +1{VP} for each {YELLOW} in the 4 center squares in your town.

name: Theater
description: 1{VP} for each other unique building type in the same row and column as this {YELLOW}.

name: Bank
description:
4{VP}. When constructed, choose a resource that you haven't yet chosen for a {PURPLE}.
As Master Builder, you can't name a resource you've chosen for a {PURPLE}.

name: Factory
description:
When constructed, choose a resource.
When another player names the chosen resource, you may place a different resource instead.

name: Trading Post
description: 1{VP}. You may treat this {PURPLE}'s space as any resource for future buildings.

name: Warehouse
description:
-1{VP} for each resource stored in this {PURPLE}.
This {PURPLE} can store up to 3 resources. When another player names a resource, you can, instead of placing it, store it in this {PURPLE}, or swap it with another resource stored in this {PURPLE} (and place that resource instead).

name: Architect's Guild
description: 1{VP}. When constructed, replace up to 2 other buildings in your town with any other building types.

name: Archive of the Second Age
description: 1{VP} for each unique building type, other than {PINK}, in your town.

name: Barrett Castle
description: {FEED}5{VP} if fed. Counts as 2 {BLUE}{PLURAL}.

name: Cathedral of Caterina
description: 2{VP}. Empty squares in your town are worth 0{VP}, instead of -1{VP}.

name: Fort Ironweed
description: 7{VP}. Unless you are the last player in the game, you can't take turns as Master Builder.

name: Grand Mausoleum of the Rodina
description: Your unfed {BLUE}{PLURAL} are worth 3{VP} each.

name: Grove University
description: 3{VP}. Immediately place a building on an empty square in your town.

name: Mandras Palace
description: 2{VP} for each unique adjacent building type.

name: Obelisk of the Crescent
description: You may place all future buildings on any empty square in your town.

name: Opaleye's Watch
description: When constructed, set aside 3 buildings of different types. Whenever a player on your immediate left or right constructs a building of a type that you have set aside, place that building on an empty square in your town.

name: Shrine of the Elder Tree
description:
{VP} based on the number of buldings in your town when constructed (including this building).
{TABLE}{7}#\1\2\3\4\5\6+\{VP}\1\2\3\4\5\8

name: Silva Forum
description: 1{VP}. +1{VP} for each building in the largest contiguous group of buildings of the same type in your town.

name: Statue of the Bondmaker
description: When another player names a resource, you may, instead of placing it, store it in one of your {BLUE}{PLURAL}. Each of your {BLUE}{PLURAL} can store 1 resource.

name: The Sky Baths
description: 2{VP} for each building type your town doesn't have.

name: The Starloom
description:
{VP} based on when you complete your town.
{TABLE}{5}#\1st\2nd\3rd\4th+\{VP}\6\3\2\0
